attributes.action: Coalition Government Has Lost Legitimacy and Must Resign Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
There is now an indisputable amount of evidence to show that this coalition government has committed vile and systematic abuses of the Human Rights of welfare claimants', yet not one member of this coalition government, nor any party in opposition, has done anything to prevent such abuses occurring.

Due to these Human Rights abuses by several and many persons whom hold a public office, this coalition government has lost any legitimacy it may once have claimed and has crossed the line into criminal conduct, which we, the people of this land, have a lawful duty to prevent.

This petition lawfully demands that this government immediately resigns and each individual person in government whom holds a public office immediately surrender themselves for detainment and trial by jury at Common Law for crimes against the people of this land.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: Let's get this govenment out, they are not confident to lead this country

Created by: Peter Johnson

Closing: 30/03/2015
